Verify when selected, it shows a background color of #f0f0f0, a font weight of 600, and a left padding of 15px
Confirm the 'Terms & Conditions' modal is hidden initially

Verify it becomes visible with opacity 1 after a 200ms animation, has width 500px, height 300px, padding 20px, background color #fff, border radius 8px, and is centered horizontally (x: calc(50% - 250px)) and vertically (y: calc(50% - 150px))
Assert the first data row in the 'Orders' table has a background color of #f9f9f9, height of 40px, contains 5 columns, and has a border bottom of 1px solid #eee
Assert the 'Status' column within this row displays the text 'Pending' in font size 14px and color #333

Validate the cart item counter displays '3' as its value with font size 14px, color #fff, background color #dc3545, border radius 50%, width 24px, height 24px, position right 10px and top 10px relative to its parent container, and is visible

Check the 'Booking Date' input field, labeled 'Date of Booking', shows the current date '2023-10-27' as its value, has a width of 150px, font family 'Roboto', height 38px, border 1px solid #ccc, and accessibility label 'Select booking date'
Verify when focused, a calendar popup is displayed

Confirm the error message 'Invalid email address' is visible, has text color #dc3545, font size 12px, top margin 5px, aligned left 0px, font weight 500, background color transparent, and remains visible for 5s before fading
Verify the 'Notifications' toggle switch is visible, enabled, has width 40px, height 24px, and its initial 'off' state shows a background color of #ccc with border radius 16px
Verify when clicked, its background color transitions to #28a745 over 200ms, indicating the 'on' state

Ensure the 'Description' tab is active, indicated by background color #fff, border bottom 2px solid #007bff, padding 10px 15px, and its text 'Description' has font weight 600, color #007bff, and font size 16px
Verify other tabs are not active
Check the 'Heart' icon in the product card is visible, color #ccc, font size 24px, has aria-label 'Add to Wishlist', its shape is an SVG path, and its initial horizontal position (x) is 10px
Verify when clicked, its color changes to #dc3545, and a slight scale animation is applied

Validate the 'Country' dropdown is enabled and displays placeholder 'Select Country', the currently selected value is 'United States', has a width of 200px, height of 38px, border 1px solid #aaa, font family 'Roboto', and its label is 'Country'
Verify the pagination component shows a total count of 5 pages
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled
Verify the 'Previous' button is disabled on page 1
Verify the '2' page number is active with background color #007bff, font color #fff, font size 14px, and 8px padding
Verify each page number button has padding 5px 10px

Ensure the 'Products List' container is scrollable, its scroll-top position is initially 0px, scroll-left is 0px, has inner padding of 15px, width of 100%, height of 400px, and background color #f5f5f5
Scroll down 200px
Verify scroll-top is 200px

Confirm a loading spinner is visible for 2s after data submission, is centered horizontally and vertically, has an animation duration of 1s, opacity of 1, circular shape with border 4px solid #f3f3f3, border-top 4px solid #3498db, and a 50px width and height

Verify the 'Preview' image displays a watermark with text 'DRAFT', horizontally and vertically centered, watermark's color is rgba(0,0,0,0.3), font size 48px, font family 'Impact', opacity is 0.5, width is 200px, height 50px, and positioned over the image
